channel.title: Comments on: A Scout Rush Build Order and Secrets In a step by step
channel.description: Learn and Play Age Of Empires 2 Just Better

item.title: By: Milan Houra
item.dc:creator: Milan Houra
item.description: Magyars got 15 proc. discount on scout line...68 food only...and attack update with next age...I got my rush champion here ;-)
item.content:encoded: Magyars got 15 proc. discount on scout line…68 food only…and attack update with next age…I got my rush champion here üòâ

item.title: By: GregStein
item.dc:creator: GregStein
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://ageofnotes.com/strategies/scout-rush-build-order-secrets-step-step/#comment-86">Galeon</a>.
Thank you for noticing that! It's fixed now the 22nd villager goes to wood to build the second lumber camp and additional 4 villagers from shepherds as a result a total of (5 + 5 = 10) Lumberjacks per every lumber camp ( 2 lumber camps)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Galeon.

Thank you for noticing that! It’s fixed now the 22nd villager goes to wood to build the second lumber camp and additional 4 villagers from shepherds as a result a total of (5 + 5 = 10) Lumberjacks per every lumber camp ( 2 lumber camps)

item.title: By: Galeon
item.dc:creator: Galeon
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://ageofnotes.com/strategies/scout-rush-build-order-secrets-step-step/#comment-85">GregStein</a>.
After every step you say what the next vil will so. Eg (Pop 21/25) 07:05 New Villager as Lumberjack. But the next step, you go to 22 pop but with no further instructions on what the vil will do?
item.content:encoded:
In reply to GregStein.

After every step you say what the next vil will so. Eg (Pop 21/25) 07:05 New Villager as Lumberjack. But the next step, you go to 22 pop but with no further instructions on what the vil will do?

item.title: By: GregStein
item.dc:creator: GregStein
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://ageofnotes.com/strategies/scout-rush-build-order-secrets-step-step/#comment-84">Galeon</a>.
It's not a 21 pop scout rush. It's 22 pop scout rush counting the scout as well in this population therefore 21 vils + 1 scout == 22 pop scout rush. The last villager or villager n¬∞21 goes to wood.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Galeon.

It’s not a 21 pop scout rush. It’s 22 pop scout rush counting the scout as well in this population therefore 21 vils + 1 scout == 22 pop scout rush. The last villager or villager n¬∞21 goes to wood.

item.title: By: Galeon
item.dc:creator: Galeon
item.description: What happens with vil n¬∞22? With this BO isn't it 21 pop?
item.content:encoded: What happens with vil n¬∞22? With this BO isn’t it 21 pop?
